body_html:
We're working on a cleaner seq2seq API now. Hope to release within the next month.
…
On Jan 13, 2017 12:43 AM, "allen" ***@***.***> wrote: @jart <https://github.com/jart> Tensorflow is such a greate framework! I can always get help quickly whenever facing problem:) There are adequate documentations, but still the more the better. For me currently focusing on dynamic seq2seq, as I have filed in another bug, I find it's hard to read seq2seq code. It would be great to see more example code showing the usage of context state and dynamic seq2seq with beam search. Also might need more documents on TensorArray. — You are receiving this because you were assigned. body:
We're working on a cleaner seq2seq API now. Hope to release within the next
month.

On Jan 13, 2017 12:43 AM, "allen" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @jart <https://github.com/jart> Tensorflow is such a greate framework! I
> can always get help quickly whenever facing problem:)
> There are adequate documentations, but still the more the better.
> For me currently focusing on dynamic seq2seq, as I have filed in another
> bug, I find it's hard to read seq2seq code.
> It would be great to see more example code showing the usage of context
> state and dynamic seq2seq with beam search.
> Also might need more documents on TensorArray.
>
